articles.title: Prevent portions of your site from being abused by spam
articles.description:
As a website owner, you might provide a few channels where your users can interact.
 Unfortunately, spammers often take advantage of these types of services to generate hundreds
 of spam pages that add little or no value to the web. Learn how to prevent spamm…

Wednesday, May 26, 2021

articles.title: How we worked with you towards a safe and spam-free Search experience in 2020
articles.description:
Making sure your Search experience is safe and free of spam is important to us and we can’t
 achieve this mission without you! Here’s how we worked with you in 2020 towards safe and
 spam-free search results.
articles.content:
Wednesday, May 26, 2021
Making sure your Google Search experience is safe and free of spam is always important to us. In 2020, we invested in many innovations to keep Google Search results clean and… [+4832 chars]
